eu.cassandra.sim
Class DemographicData

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.DemographicData

public class DemographicData
extends java.lang.Object

The simulation's demographic data, used to instantiate entities in dynamic scenarios.

Author:
Fani A. Tzima (fani [dot] tzima [at] iti [dot] gr)

Instantiates a new demographic data object.

Parameters:
name - the demographic data set's name
description - the demographic data set's description
type - the demographic data set's type
numEntities - the number of entities (installations) to be created
inst_probs - the probabilities of participation for defined installations
person_probs - the probabilities of participation for defined persons
app_probs - the probabilities of participation for defined appliances
